reviewText:
Loose Cannons
A funny movie about an unorthodox cop, who gets a new partner.
The new partner has a split personality.
They're given a case involving Nazis, Massad, porno industry.
Gene Hackman, Dan Aykroyd, Dom DeLuise are hilarious!

Another You
George (Gene Wilder) has been in a mental hospital for 3 years.
Eddie Dash, a con-man who is supposed to help him.
But when people begin to recognize George as the missing millionaire Abe,
Eddie gets greedy. .
Two comedy classics with lots of laughs.
Loose Cannons is one of my favorites! You'll laugh your head off!!!
These are great old school comedy's.

I never heard of the second movie. I had purchased this for Loose Cannons. Sometimes you just need that movie to show your friends (or kids) what the heck you're talking about. Endless laughs to be held from a great pair of actors. Dan Ackroid suffers from PTSD and maintains over 200+ personas in his breakdowns while solving the Alice in Wonderland crimes.
